alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 6:53PM EST until March 07 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otsego County in central New York... Broome County in central New York... Southwestern Delaware County in central New York... Eastern Tioga County in central New York... Southern Chenango County in central New York... Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Eastern Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 745 PM EST. * At 652 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Willet to New Albany, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scranton, Binghamton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Vestal, Muhlenberg, Johnson City, Endicott, Kingston and Berwick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wayne; Wyoming
